CSGO
this is one of my favorite games on steam. that is because it fun to play, It has good quality and you can play it whit you friends.

CSGO is a game whit many game modes. you can play com competitive, casual, demolition an a lot of more game modes. it is a game based on two team CT (counter terroist) and T (teortist) the T assignment it to plant the bomb and the CT task is to make it not make the bomb planted. but if the bomb gets planted they have 40 secends to defuse it.

FIVE STARS FROM ME :D
